text: Ohtamış Waterfall () is a waterfall in Ordu Province, northern Turkey. Ohtamış Waterfall is located in the Ohtamış village of Ulubey district in Ordu Province. It is distant from Ordu and about from Ulubey. Ohtamış Waterfall falls from a height of at almost right angle, and it is so the biggest waterfall in the Black Sea Region. ==References== Category:Waterfalls of Turkey Category:Landforms of Ordu Province Category:Ulubey District
title: Ohtamış Waterfall
